newsArray.title: ‘Things are finally shifting...’: Mohammed Shami on BCCI allowing bowlers to use saliva on balls during IPL
creator: Press Trust of India
newsArray.description: India's veteran pacer Mohammed Shami stated that the decision by Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) to lift the ban from using saliva on balls has brought balance between bowlers and batters in the Indian Premier League (IPL) 2025.The post ‘Things are finally shifting...’: Mohammed Shami on BCCI allowing bowlers to use saliva on balls during IPL appeared first on Cricket Country.
